Dss_DctrlGlobalDssParams Struct Reference

Structure containing global DSS Configuration. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_GLOBAL_DSS_PARAMS. More...

Data Fields

CSL_DssGlobalMFlagCfg globalMflagCfg

Detailed Description

Structure containing global DSS Configuration. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_GLOBAL_DSS_PARAMS.

Field Documentation
